headline: Costco (COST) Pre-Earnings: Why This Retail Giant Is Poised to Keep Climbing
summary: Costco (COST) is scheduled to report its Fiscal Q1 results on December 12th, after the closing bell. The wholesale giant has been one of the most successful retail stocks of 2024 and has maintained strong performance for several years. As earnings day approaches, I see no reason for this trend to be interrupted. headline: Why Costco Stock Jumped 11% Last Month
summary: Shares of retail giant Costco Wholesale (NASDAQ: COST) jumped 11.2% during November, according to data provided by S&P Global Market Intelligence.  The company reported monthly sales results early in the month and that's all the encouragement that investors needed to send the stock to an all-time high approaching $1,000 per share.  Costco's sales results for October were released on Nov. 6, showing a 7% increase from October 2023.

headline: Walmart Stock, Costco Roar As They Create Amazon-Like Businesses
summary: The traditional retailers have outrun many Big Tech stocks amid e-commerce shift in a complex consumer environment.

headline: Costco Wholesale Stock Is Still a Winner, But It’s Priced to Perfection
summary: Costco’s $1.50 hot dog might not be going anywhere, but the retailer’s impressive stock run means the shares now costs a pretty penny.  Shares of  Costco Wholesale  edged lower Thursday after the company said its November sales climbed 5.6% year over year, a slowdown from October’s pace.  Total comparable sales growth also decelerated month over month, to 3.1%, although core comps—excluding the impact of gasoline and currency—were up 4.9%.

headline: Costco's Combo Of Strong Loyalty, Unmatched Value Is Rare In Retail: Analyst
summary: On Thursday, JP Morgan analyst Christopher Horvers raised the price target on Costco Wholesale Corporation (NASDAQ:COST) to $1,090 (from $945 prior) while maintaining an Overweight rating following November sales results. The company reported net sales of $21.87 billion for the retail month of November (four weeks ending December 1, 2024), reflecting a 5.6% increase from $20.71 billion last year. For the twelve-week first quarter ending November 24, 2024, net sales reached $60.99 billion, up 7.5

headline: Costco Says Late Thanksgiving Weekend 'Negatively Impacted' Online Sales
summary: Costco said its e-commerce sales in November were hit as this year’s Thanksgiving weekend happened a week later this year versus the last one, affecting year-over-year comparisons.
